question: I have plans to go for nafil Hajj this year. Is it permissible for me to leave my wife alone while I make Hajj or do I have to forgo my Hajj to stay with her?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
You may perfdorm nafl Haj and make arrangements to fulfill your
responsibilities of making provisions for your dependants, wife and children
(if any) in your absence.


And Allah Ta'ala knows best

Mufti E. Desai
